about_the_game:
Dark, eerie, dangerous, do you dare enter the realm where peril and torture surely await?

Horror Soundscapes from Ayato Sound Create provides you with 26 ambient, spooky, and unsettling atmospheres to set a demented, unearthly and dark tone for your game.

Tracklist:

01.Beast01
02.Beast02
03.Beast03

26.Only Rain
